thread.title: Jerry Brown makes the right call in signing California’s right-to-die bill
thread.title_full: Jerry Brown makes the right call in signing California’s right-to-die bill - The Washington Post

author: Editorial Board
title: Jerry Brown makes the right call in signing California’s right-to-die bill
text:
California Gov. Jerry Brown. (Damian Dovarganes/Associated Press) By Editorial Board October 9 at 7:24 PM CALIFORNIA GOV. Jerry Brown (D) has signed a bill allowing doctors to prescribe lethal drugs to terminally ill patients who want to hasten their deaths. That makes California the fifth — and largest — state to permit medical aid in dying. It is a victory for the death-with-dignity movement that may inspire other states to follow. It is critical that the state implement the measure with the same care that characterized its deliberations.
The End of Life Option Act , modeled on a law implemented in Oregon in 1997 , was signed by Mr. Brown on Monday . The measure will take effect
